title: Rich & Poor: What Can We Do?
creator_credit: Alan Hart, Ian McFarlane and Film Inc.
brief_description: In a mutual struggle for global survival the rich world and the poor world must work together. The basic problem is food and lasting change requires developmental aid. From “Five minutes to midnight”.
